about_the_game:
You must have chapter 2 installed to access chapter 3.


Thalos, the world’s oldest vampire, and Dusty, the leader of the vampire hunters, must work together to destroy the insidious vampire Johann. Thalos felt a sublime attachment to Dusty ever since he accidentally made Dusty his familiar. Can love blossom between vampire and hunter?



There is finally a chance to catch their breaths, and for Thalos and Dusty to know some precious alone time.

The riveting kinetic visual novel continues! Also included is a prologue with Thalos and Williams from the 1800s. Players can have all text read out loud by pressing 'v' on their keyboards.
